title: Does Donald Trump Watch ‘The Gorilla Channel’?
subtitle: An excerpt purportedly from the book "Fire and Fury" convinced more than a few readers that the president spends much of his days watching a channel created to placate him.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: Michael Wolff wrote in his book "Fire and Fury" that White House aides created a fake "Gorilla Channel" to placate President Donald Trump.
